titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at Pauls Crosse the 24. of October. 1624. By Robert Bedingfield Master of Arts, and student of Christ-Church in Oxford
titleStmt.author: Bedingfield, Robert, 1597 or 8-1651.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Lichfield and William Turner, for Henry Cripps,
